title: U.S. Army Veterans, Survivors To Mark 70th Anniversary Of Dachau Liberation
teaser: The Nazi concentration camp at at Dachau was liberated by U.S. troops 70 years ago Wednesday. Survivors and U.S. Army veterans are gathering at the camp in Germany for a commemoration this weekend.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
